name: Insectobot Tactics: A Strategic Multiplayer Game
blurb: Insectobot Tactics is a simple multiplayer strategy game. Choose your insectobots, place them on the map, last one standing wins!

rewards.reward: We appreciate every dollar we receive, and for contributing to the project you will receive recognition on our website, early access to the game, and when the game is released, you will also receive the ad-free version.
All previous rewards, and you will start the game with all bugs unlocked.
All previous rewards, and each of your bugs will get an alternate color scheme related to Kickstarter! This color set will only be available to supporters from Kickstarter.

All previous rewards, plus a digital compilation of the artwork and sketches used to create the game. Also, you will receive a "Supporter" status, which will get you free updates and expansions forever. New characters, color sets, maps, possibly a single player campaign down the road, you can have it all for free just by helping us out now. (For the printed book which includes all of these pictures and more, see the $165 or $195 tier)
All previous rewards, and receive a poster with one of the insects from the roster, or choose of the group posters. Let us know which you want!
Receive all rewards from the $30 tier, and an exclusive t-shirt! You will have a choice between a few designs, which will be revealed as funding occurs.

Receive all rewards from the $65 tier, and a concept art book containing prints of all of the characters, and some exclusive content not included with the digital compilation. The book will be professionally printed on 8.5" x 8.5" paper. Also, all tiers over $100 will receive in-game recognition in the credits area.
Receive all rewards from the $95 tier, and the concept art book. This is similar to the $165 tier, except instead of a poster, you will get to choose one of the t-shirts.
Receive all of the rewards from the $195 tier, and receive a large custom sketch showing your choice of two of the Insectobots fighting.

Receive all rewards from the $30 tier, a poster, a t-shirt, the concept art book, and choose a new environment to be in the game! Haunted house? Futuristic spaceport? You let us know, and we will work with you to add it to the game.

Receive all rewards from the $195 tier, plus a poster of your choosing, and choice of an alternate color set and pose for an Insectobot of your choice. The roster currently sits at 18, and each insect will only get one alternate color, so insect choice will be subject to availability!

Receive all rewards from the $195 tier, and choose a new insect to be in the game! Feel free to submit sketches, or ideas for stats and attack type. We will work with you to make this happen! Also, receive a poster-sized sketch of your bug to show off to the world. It will be glorious.

This tier is a special place reserved for developer-like status. A fully colored and shaded poster will be created just for you, which will also be featured in the game's battle results screen. Also, in the game, you will be recognized at the bottom of the results screen as well as at the top of the credits section. You will receive future updates, digital sketches, be part of discussions and be privy to conversations that take place before new features are added to the game. You will be able to work with the development team, and can help shape this game into a masterpiece. You will also receive all rewards from the $195 tier, plus one of the standard posters of your choosing.
